short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A fun cookie clicker game with SMOLSKULLs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
💀🍪 Keep clicking them! This is a fun and smol simple game where you click to see different SMOLSKULLs. It's deadly easy to play; if you have a mouse you can do it!

______________________________________
🤷 What Is the Smolskull Clicker Game?

A cookie clicker is a type of game where you click to earn points. The more you click, the more points you get. As you earn points, you can unlock a new level and see a new smol skull. It's a great way to pass the time and have fun!

______________________________________
🎮 How To Play This Game?

✔️ 1. Open the Extension: 
Click on the SMOLSKULL icon in your Chrome toolbar to open the game (make sure you pin it for quick access).

✔️ 2. Start Clicking: 
Click on the SMOLSKULL. CLICKERICLICK CLICK CLICK!

✔️ 3. Keep going forever: 
Each click adds a point to your progress. After a while you go to the next level. A new level means you see the next smolskull. 

✔️ 4. Check Your Score: 
Your total clicks and current level are shown on the screen. 

The SMOLSKULL Clicker Game is easy to play but hard to stop. The more you click, the more you want to keep going!
There are 2000 levels and images to unlock, does the fun ever end? Nope!

______________________________________
⭐ Get Started Now!

Install the SMOLSKULL Cookie Clicker extension and start clicking today. It's free and fun for everyone!
The extension is restricted and doesn't have any access to any content of the browser.

______________________________________
🎨 Who made smolskulls?

Smolskulls is a generative art project by Mark Knol (@mknol). 
Smol pixelart skull face. more info: smolskulls.xyz

______________________________________
❓ Need Help?

If you have any questions or need help, feel free to reach out. 

Happy clicking! 🎉💀
